          <title>
            <string language="hu">Pantokrátor, 5. század, Galla Placidia-mauzóleum a bejárat felől, Ravenna, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Pantocrator, 5th century, from the entrance mausoleum of Galla Placidia, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pantocrator, 5. Jahrhundert, vom Eingang Mausoleum 
von Galla Placidia, Ravenna, Mosaik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pantocrator, 5ème siècle, du mausolée 
d'entrée du galla Placidia, Ravenne, mosaïque</string>

Galla Placidia, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pantocrator, quinto secolo, dal mausoleum 
dell'entrata del galla Placidia, Ravenna, mosaico</string>

Galla Placidia, Ραβένα, μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pantocrator, 5to siglo, del mausoleo de la entrada
del galla Placidia, Ravena, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A ravennai mozaikok egyik szép példája, részlete: a Pantokrátor, a Világbíró alakja.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the nice examples of the mosaics of Ravenna, details: the Pantocrator, the figure of the Judge of the world</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Galla Placidia,  Krisztus,  a világbíró,  Pantokratór,  Pantokrátor,  </string>
            <string language="en">Galla Placidia, Christ, the Judge of the world, Pantocrator, Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eins der netten Beispiele der Mosaiken von 
Ravenna, Details: das Pantocrator, die Abbildung des Richters 
der Welt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un des exemples gentils des mosaïques de 
Ravenne, détails : le Pantocrator, la figure du juge du monde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um dos exemplos agradáveis dos mosaics de Ravenna,
detalhes: o Pantocrator, a figura do juiz do mundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno degli esempi piacevoli dei mosaici di

mondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα από τα συμπαθητικά παραδείγματα των μωσαϊκών της
Ραβένας, λεπτομέρειες: το Pantocrator, ο αριθμός του 
δικαστή του κόσμου</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Uno de los ejemplos agradables de los mosaicos de

          <keyword>
